section.title: Overview
section.p: This use case demonstrates the ability of NCC to provide policy rules related to User Location , for example roaming.

ul.li: Simulate attachment for a device from 3GPP-SGSN-MCC-MNC = 310026 and verify that NCC returns PCC base rule name default-crbn.
Simulate attachment for a device from 3GPP-SGSN-MCC-MNC = 767334 and verify that NCC returns PCC base rule name default-crbn-cm.
Simulate attachment for a device from 3GPP-SGSN-MCC-MNC.MNC = 767767 and verify that NCC returns PCC Base rule name default-crbn-ir.

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

ol.li: Log in to the SM GUI, and navigate to Subscriber Manager and select Devices tab. Click to create a device.

Create the predefined PCC base rules: default-crbn, default-crbn-cm, default-crbn-ir. To do this, log into the SM GUI and navigate to Policy & Charging Configuration and select Policy tab. Select Network Rule Templates from the drop-down list. Click to create a PCC rule as shown in the following figure.
default-crbn rule
default-crbn-cm rule
